text: Pentagon bus station was the main bus station in Chatham, Kent, South East England. It was part of the Pentagon Shopping Centre. It was replaced by Chatham Waterfront bus station in 2011. ==Related pages== *Pentagon Shopping Centre *Chatham Waterfront bus station ==References== Category:Chatham, Kent Category:Bus transport in the United Kingdom Category:Public transport in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in Kent
title: Pentagon bus station
